data.title: Naughty by Nature - Members, Ages, Trivia
data.meta_description: Learn about Naughty by Nature: discover its members ranked by popularity, see when it formed, view trivia, and more.
data.text:
About

Grammy Award-winning American hip-hop trio known for successful singles such as "O.P.P," "Uptown Anthem," and "Hip Hop Hooray." Their 1995 studio album Poverty's Paradise took home the coveted Grammy Award for Best Rap Album.

Trivia

They were named Favorite New Artist - Rap / Hip-Hop at the 1992 American Music Awards. They produced a remix of Michael Jackson and Janet Jackson's "Scream."
